noun.description: A person living near or next door to the speaker or person referred to.
examples: our garden was the envy of the neighbors

verb.description: (of a place or thing) be situated next to or very near (another)
examples: the square neighbors the old quarter of the town

origin: Old English nēahgebūr, from nēah nigh, near + gebūr inhabitant, peasant, farmer (compare with boor).
